package.name: llvm
package.unpack: tar xf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src.tar.xz cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src tar -xf ${SRCDIR}/cfe-${PKGVERSION}.src.tar.xz -C tools tar -xf ${SRCDIR}/compiler-rt-${PKGVERSION}.src.tar.xz -C projects mv tools/cfe-${PKGVERSION}.src tools/clang mv projects/compiler-rt-${PKGVERSION}.src projects/compiler-rt cd ..
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src sed -e 's:/docs/llvm:/share/doc/llvm:' -i Makefile.config.in if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 4 ` export CC='distcc gcc' export CXX='distcc g++' else export CC='gcc' export CXX='g++' fi ./configure --prefix=/usr \ --sysconfdir=/etc \ --enable-libffi \ --enable-optimized \ --enable-shared \ --disable-assertions --disable-bindings if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then pump make -j $jobcount CC='distcc gcc' CXX='distcc g++' else make -j 4 fi
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} for file in ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/lib{clang,LLVM,LTO}*.a ; do test -f $file && chmod -v 644 $file done install -v -dm755 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/clang-analyzer for prog in scan-build scan-view ; do cp -rfv tools/clang/tools/$prog ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/clang-analyzer/ ln -sfv ../lib/clang-analyzer/$prog/$prog ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/ done ln -sfv /usr/bin/clang ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/clang-analyzer/scan-build/
